TitlePage.Title: &UnitLib;
TitlePage.Subtitle: The library of normalized unit groups of modular group algebras
TitlePage.Author:
Alexander Konovalov konovalov@member.ams.org http://homepages.vub.ac.be/~okonoval/
Department of Mathematics
Vrije Universiteit Brussel
Pleinlaan 2, Brussels

Ul.Zhukovskogo, 66, Zaporozhye
69600 Ukraine
TitlePage.Abstract:
&UnitLib; package
The &UnitLib; package extends the &LAGUNA; package and contains the library of normalized unit groups of modular group algebras of all finite p-groups of order not greater than 128 over the field of p elements.

If you publish a result which was partially obtained with the usage of &UnitLib;, please cite it in the following form:
A. Konovalov and E. Yakimenko. UnitLib --- The library of normalized unit groups of modular group algebras, Version 1.0; 2006 (http://ukrgap.exponenta.ru/unitlib.htm).
